sentence.Network_en: Thousands of men struggled humiliatingly for jobs.
sentence.Network_cn: 数千名男子不顾颜面地疯抢工作。

sentence.Network_en: He was caught cheating during the Seoul Olympics and humiliatingly stripped of his title.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被发现在汉城奥运会上作弊，因此遭极不光彩地剥夺了冠军称号。

sentence.Network_en: The painting was reproduced humiliatingly small.
sentence.Network_cn: 那幅画被临摹得很小,而且是小的可怜.

entry.tran: 使人蒙受耻辱的;让人出丑的;丢脸的
entry.def: If something is humiliating, it embarrasses you and makes you feel ashamed and stupid.

example.ex: The Conservatives have suffered a humiliating defeat...
example.tran: 保守党人遭受到了一次颜面尽失的失败。

example.ex: It was so humiliating, a terrible blow to my self-esteem.
example.tran: 这件事如此丢脸，深深地挫伤了我的自尊心。

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
